content: A self-titled album released by what legendary British rock band in 1969 is often referred to as the 'White Album'?

I believe you're referring to The Beatles' self-titled album, often known as the "White Album," released in 1968, not 1969. It's called the White Album because its original cover was white with only the band's name embossed on it. However, if you're thinking of a different album, please let me know!
